title: Contact Amigos
subtitle: Get in Touch for Expert Visa Guidance
description: Ready to start your study abroad journey? Our expert consultants at Amigos are here to help you every step of the way. Contact us today for a free consultation.

office.address: Civic Centre, Mian Plaza, Block D2, Office Number 1, Johar Town, Lahore, Pakistan 54782

services.title: Free Consultation
services.description: 30-minute free consultation to assess your visa requirements and success probability.

services.title: Document Review
services.description: Comprehensive review of your documents and identification of any gaps or improvements needed.

services.title: Complete Visa Support
services.description: End-to-end visa application support including documentation, application submission, and interview preparation.

faqs.question: How long does the visa process take?
faqs.answer: Processing times vary by country and visa type. Tourist visas typically take 5-30 days, while study visas can take 4-12 weeks. We provide specific timelines during your consultation.

faqs.question: What is your success rate?
faqs.answer: We maintain a 95% success rate across all visa categories. Our expertise and thorough preparation significantly increase your chances of approval.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds if the visa is rejected?
faqs.answer: We offer a 'Success Guarantee' program where we provide a partial refund if your visa is rejected due to our error in documentation or process.

faqs.question: Can you help with urgent visa applications?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer expedited processing services for urgent applications. Additional fees may apply, and success depends on the destination country's policies.
